content.text:
Goal: Create a new goal for a student and confirm it appears in the goals list.

Notes:
- Replace {STUDENT_ID} if needed.
- Make the description unique.

Steps:
- navigate to /students/{STUDENT_ID}/goals
- click the link "+ New Goal"
- waitFor a heading "New Goal"
- type "pw_mcpgoal_desc_<timestamp>" into the field labeled "Description"
- type "pw_mcpcategory" into the field labeled "Category"
- type "pw_mcpmeasure" into the field labeled "Measurement"
- type "pw_mcpowner" into the field labeled "Owner"
- type "2025-12-31" into the field labeled "Target Date"
- click the button "Create"
- waitFor a URL that matches /students/{STUDENT_ID}/goals$
- waitFor text "pw_mcpgoal_desc_<timestamp>" to be visible
- screenshot name=goal_list_after_create
